text:
e="preserve">Suzana Amaral Rezende (March 28, 1932 – June 25, 2020) was a Brazilian movie director and screenwriter. She was best known for directing and writing the 1985 movie "Hour of the Star" and the 2001 movie "Uma Vida em Segredo". Amaral was born in São Paulo, Brazil.
Amaral died at a hospital in São Paulo on June 25, 2020 at the age of 88.
